sqlMap.select: /* batchResult.totalCount */ SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM BATCH_RESULT a INNER JOIN BATCH_ACTION b ON a.ACTION_ID=b.ACTION_ID WHERE 1=1 a.STATUS LIKE #statusCond#||'%' b.NAME LIKE #name0Cond#||'%' a.EXECUT_END BETWEEN #executStartCond# AND #executEndCond#

/* batchResult.findByPage */ SELECT tb1.* FROM ( SELECT a.RESULT_ID, ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY $sortColumn$ $sortMethod$ ORDER BY a.UPD_DATIM DESC ) as rnum FROM BATCH_RESULT a INNER JOIN BATCH_ACTION b ON a.ACTION_ID=b.ACTION_ID WHERE 1=1 a.STATUS LIKE #statusCond#||'%' b.NAME LIKE #name0Cond#||'%' a.EXECUT_END BETWEEN #executStartCond# AND #executEndCond# ) tb1 WHERE tb1.rnum BETWEEN #startRow# AND #endRow#

/* batchResult.findByCondition */ SELECT RESULT_ID FROM BATCH_RESULT WHERE SCHEDULE_ID=#batchScheduleId# AND ACTION_ID=#batchActionId# PARAMETER=#parameter# AND EXECUT_START > current timestamp -1 minutes

/* batchResult.detail */
SELECT a.RESULT_ID, a.SCHEDULE_ID, a.ACTION_ID, b.NAME ACTION_NAME0, a.PARAMETER, a.STATUS, a.ERROR_INFO, a.EXECUT_START, a.EXECUT_END, a.UPD_USER_ID, a.UPD_DATIM FROM BATCH_RESULT a INNER JOIN BATCH_ACTION b ON a.ACTION_ID=b.ACTION_ID WHERE 1=1 AND a.RESULT_ID=#resultId#
/* batchResult.exist */ SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM BATCH_RESULT WHERE 1=1 AND RESULT_ID=#resultId#
sqlMap.insert: /* batchResult.insert */ INSERT INTO BATCH_RESULT ( RESULT_ID,SCHEDULE_ID,ACTION_ID ,PARAMETER ,STATUS ,ERROR_INFO ,EXECUT_START ,EXECUT_END ,UPD_USER_ID,UPD_DATIM ) VALUES ( #resultId#,#scheduleId#,#actionId# ,#parameter# ,#status# ,#errorInfo# ,#executStart# ,#executEnd# ,#updUserId#,#updDatim# )
sqlMap.update:
/* batchResult.update */ UPDATE BATCH_RESULT
SET RESULT_ID=#resultId#,SCHEDULE_ID=#scheduleId#,ACTION_ID=#actionId#,PARAMETER=#parameter#,STATUS=#status#,ERROR_INFO=#errorInfo#,EXECUT_END=#executEnd#,UPD_DATIM=#updDatim#
SET RESULT_ID=#resultId#,SCHEDULE_ID=#scheduleId#,ACTION_ID=#actionId#,STATUS=#status#,ERROR_INFO=#errorInfo#,EXECUT_END=#executEnd#,UPD_DATIM=#updDatim#
WHERE 1=1 AND RESULT_ID=#resultId#
sqlMap.delete:
/* batchResult.delete */
DELETE FROM BATCH_RESULT WHERE 1=1 AND RESULT_ID=#resultId#
